actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-348.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 309 - 108 (Record Vote No: 339).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1036) to provide employment opportunities to long-term unemployed individuals in high unemployment areas in projects to repair and renovate vitally needed community facilities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1036 (public service employment programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1036) to provide employment opportunities to long-term unemployed individuals in high unemployment areas in projects to repair and renovate vitally needed community facilities, and for other purposes.
